availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet Henderson on August 7, 1822. Father of William D. Sellers, Elizabeth Sellers, Benjamin F. Sellers, Melissa Sellers, and Harriett Sellers. Cooper in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 30.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 167.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, File # 000344098, Bracken County, August 7, 1822.
